system.description:
You have learned to blend the lessons of two disparate types of martial training together, making you more versatile than either would allow you to be on its own. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain proficiency with a combat tradition of your choice.

  • Your fighter levels count as adept levels for the purpose of the Extra Attack feature.

  • Your fighter levels count as adept levels for the purpose of determining which Focus Feature options you can take.

  • Half of your adept levels count as fighter levels for the purpose of acquiring instances of the fighter’s Maneuver Specialization feature.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in adept, 3 levels in fighter
